title: Lattice enthalpy based on radius and charge

content.question: Which of the following statements about lattice enthalpy is consistent with the information in the table?

choices.label: It increases with the increasing radii of the ions in the compound.
It increases with the decreasing radii of the ions in the compound.
It increases with the decreasing charge of the ions.
It increases with the decreasing electronegativity of the atoms.

content.answer: It increases with the decreasing radii of the ions in the compound.
